attributes.action: stop treating all people who enjoy an alcoholic drink in moderation  as 'alcoholics'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed  hike in the cost of wine and spirits is unacceptable, the root cause of binge drinking lies in the lax  custodians of the pub trade/ clubs who should stop serving drinks to those who are drunk. We should stop all benefits and sick leave to alcoholic related  illnesses .Those of us who enjoy a glass in the evening should not be penalised for this  youth culture , ( note  youths of the 'things will only get better  generation ) .  This is just an excuse for another tax

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
